text: Need Mia White for Harvey Norman campaign. Budget around $9,155, looking for 2 x Facebook story, 2 x TV appearance, 3 x 90-second product demo, 2 x YouTube short, 3 x 15-second TikTok. 8 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
